title: 05/27/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 05/27/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin gives praise to the Knicks for winning a playoff game for the first time since 2013 but he lays out the reality of what their roster is when compared to other NBA super teams. Tebow-mania has officially returned to the NFL as rumors about the Heisman Trophy winner potentially playing quarterback again have already surfaced. He casts doubt about the drama between Aaron Rodgers and the Packers could have been easily avoided. Plus, NBA Champion Metta World Peace joins the show to talk about a fan pouring popcorn on Russell Westbrook and his experience with unruly fans in the NBA.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
